summary: The module implements test utilities for the text-to-image diffusion examples, checking that checkpoint handling, total checkpoint limits, and exponential moving average (EMA) behavior work correctly, and provides a helper to generate images from prompts using the Stable Diffusion XL model.
business_intent: Automate verification of text-to-image generation pipelines to guarantee correct checkpoint management and model behavior, supporting developers in maintaining reliable diffusion example code.
